code: import{useState}from"react";import{useLogin}from"../hooks/useLogin";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const{login,error,isLoading}=useLogin();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await login(email,password);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"login",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Log In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email address:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),value:email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),value:password}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{disabled:isLoading,children:"Log in"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error",children:error})]});};export default Login;
